thread.title: BRIEF-Civeo Receives Investment Canada Approval And Competition Bureau Clearance For Acquisition Of Noralta Lodge

title: BRIEF-Civeo Receives Investment Canada Approval And Competition Bureau Clearance For Acquisition Of Noralta Lodge

organizations.name: competition bureau clearance for acquisition of noralta lodge reuters staff

text: February 21, 2018 / 11:05 AM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Civeo Receives Investment Canada Approval And Competition Bureau Clearance For Acquisition Of Noralta Lodge Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 21 (Reuters) - Civeo Corp: * CIVEO RECEIVES INVESTMENT CANADA APPROVAL AND COMPETITION BUREAU CLEARANCE FOR ITS PENDING ACQUISITION OF NORALTA LODGE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
